metadata.title: CVE-2021-47425 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i2c: acpi: fix resource leak in reconfiguration device additionacpi_i2c_find_adapter_by_handle() calls bus_find_device() which takes areference on the adapter which is never released which will result in areference count leak and render the adapter unremovable.  Make sure toput the adapter after creating the client in the same manner that we dofor OF.[wsa: fixed title]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
